recipe.name: Cranberry Jam
recipe.ingredients: 484 grams (1 pound) peeled, cored, and quartered apples 57 grams (1/4 cup or 2 ounces) water 2 teaspoons salt 968 grams (2 pounds) fresh or frozen cranberries 400 grams (about 2 cups) sugar, or to taste 57 grams (1/4 cup or 2 ounces) bourbon 1 tablespoon vanilla extract 2 teaspoons ground ginger

step.describe: Add sugar, bourbon, vanilla, and ginger
Remove the lid carefully as the mixture may still be boiling. Use a spoon to take a sample of the mixture and let it cool before tasting. Add more sugar, salt, or ginger, as desired.
Transfer to storage jars, or, for a completely smooth jam, pass through a fine-mesh strainer to remove seeds and skins.
